text: @narendramodi Fine Modiji! V hope tat u'll take right decisions @ the appropriate time .4the people on Post COVID19..Am inline vith my Kerala State CM Sri Pinarayi Vijayan's view on Public Tpt.System request 2 allow CM 2 take action & responsibilities 2. Alagappan Kochi Camp T N 12-05-2020
